plot: American tourist Tom Ewell hops off the boat in the sleepy little village of Curacao in the Caribbean, and his visit quickly becomes a nightmare of slapstick mishaps. More so for the villagers than Tom.
title: Paramount Pacemaker No. K9-1: Caribbean Capers
plot_es: American tourist Tom Ewell hops off the boat in the sleepy little village of Curacao in the Caribbean, and his visit quickly becomes a nightmare of slapstick mishaps. More so for the villagers than Tom.
